abstract: The federal judge overseeing the government’s civil lawsuit against Bank of America over its Merrill Lynch deal ruled Monday that the Charlotte banking giant can’t rely use media reports about the merger as supporting evidence.
snippet: The federal judge overseeing the government’s civil lawsuit against Bank of America over its Merrill Lynch deal ruled Monday that the Charlotte banking giant can’t rely use media reports about the merger as supporting evidence.
lead_paragraph: The federal judge overseeing the government’s civil lawsuit against Bank of America over its Merrill Lynch deal ruled Monday that media reports about the merger could not be used as supporting evidence.

headline.main: Judge Excludes Media Reports in Bank of America Case
